file_content.text: My leg... blast you.
Please, just go.
So, this card player... just need to get his people off my back.
Tell the Hutt I always appreciate a fan, but I don't need anyone to stake me.
Hello, Ta. Look who you found.
Kaliyo?
Kaliyo, it's--it's fantastic to see you... who's your friend?
I work with her, and she wanted me here for this.
Kaliyo and I are partners.
Bodyguard. Don't look at me.
Just the hired help.
Of course. I understand.
Who I am is the least of your problems.
Stupid question.
Kaliyo and I are very close associates. Is that a problem?
I'm the man she's with, idiot.
I don't appreciate your tone....
Hey! Eyes on me.
You want to tell me what you were thinking, looking for me? Hiring investigators, bribing dock managers?
I just wanted to find you.
You're messing with my life. A lot of people want me dead, and if you find me, a lot of other people find me too.
I didn't think--I wanted you back with me. I want to share the penthouse again and the money and--I want you not to leave.
How long were you two a couple?
So you two lived together...?
Five months. We met after a sabacc tournament. She conned me out of half the winnings, but she came back. Didn't you?
Yeah, and look where it got me.
[Remain silent]
He's the threat we came to deal with?
This guy is pathetic.
I never said he was a fighter.
Why'd you leave, Kaliyo?
You're not asking the questions! You listen good, you worm--I'm not going to let you ruin me.
So you'll kill me instead? For not giving up on you?
Kaliyo made her decision. Now you're only hurting her. And yourself.
You have to let her go, Ta.
I tried to keep her safe. I'm sorry.
Walk away. This man isn't worth your time.
Kaliyo, this is beneath you.
Blast it... I know. I was hoping he'd have security or something.
I'm sorry.
Of course you're sorry. It's why I left you, Ta--you're boring.
We don't have time for this. Just shoot him.
Go on and kill him, Kaliyo.
Yeah, I'll shoot him....
Argh!
...but I can't kill him. This time.
I can't... I can't feel my leg.
You want to know why I left behind the flash and the credits, Ta? It's because you're boring.
Let's go. Hope the next target's more interesting.
Let's go. I don't want to talk about this now.
Sorry, I'm getting ready for a game.
